text:
[redacted_name] balançou para trás nas patas traseiras, levantando as asas. Ele subiu no ar e me seguiu. “Está tudo bem,” eu disse a ele, não querendo que ele se
preocupasse. “É?” [redacted_name] perguntou. “Sim,” eu disse, prestes a ter certeza de que estava tudo bem. “Lamento encerrar esta reunião abruptamente.” "Tudo bem." [redacted_name] avançou. “Há algo em que possamos ajudá-lo?” Balancei a cabeça enquanto abria a porta. Havia uma boa chance de eu estar exagerando. Enquanto [redacted_name]
permanecesse em [redacted_name] , Kyn não sentiria sua presença.
Mas…
Minha pele arrepiou e pensei logo depois que Rhain e eu nos separamos. Eu estava andando de um lado para o outro e, sim, quase sempre estava me movendo ou me remexendo, mas havia uma corrente de nervosismo ali. Um
que pensei ter sido alimentado por não fazer algo proativo.
E se eu estivesse errado?
Olhei para o redemoinho brilhante na minha mão direita enquanto abria a porta. A visão disso acalmou alguns dos
trans:
[redacted_name] leaned back on his back legs, raising his wings. He took flight and followed me. "It's okay," I reassured him, not wanting him to
worry. "Is it?" [redacted_name] asked. "Yes," I replied, ready to make sure everything was okay. "I'm sorry to cut this meeting short." "Alright." [redacted_name] came forward. "Is there anything we can help you with?" I shook my head, opening the door. There was a good chance I was overreacting. As long as [redacted_name]
stayed in [redacted_name], Kyn wouldn't detect his presence.
But...
My skin prickled as I recalled the moment after Rhain and I had parted ways. I had been pacing, mostly moving or fidgeting, but there had been an underlying nervousness.
A nervousness I thought had come from not taking proactive steps.
What if I was wrong?
I gazed at the glowing whirlwind in my right hand as I opened the door, the sight of it eased some of the
